name: Castform

passive.name: Hail
passive.effect: Whenever you generate any Ice Energy, you may generate one more. When you attach an Energy to this Pokemon, you may search your deck for a card named Castform, replace it with this one, and shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. Generate an Ice Energy: If heads, put it into your opponent's hand. If tails, shuffle it into your opponent's deck.

flavor: Castform are pernicious creatures that change with the weather.
